verses.verse: וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> Wherefore שְׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> I pray thee hear נָ֣א <WH4994> please אִיּ֣וֹב <WH347> Job מִלָּ֑י <WH4405> my speeches וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> to all דְּבָרַ֥י <WH1697> to all my words הַאֲזִֽינָה׃ <WH238> and hearken

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֭א <WH4994> now פָּתַ֣חְתִּי <WH6605> Behold now I have opened פִ֑י <WH6310> my mouth דִּבְּרָ֖ה <WH1696> hath spoken לְשׁוֹנִ֣י <WH3956> my tongue בְחִכִּֽי׃ <WH2441> in my mouth

יֹֽשֶׁר־ <WH3476> [shall be of] the uprightness לִבִּ֥י <WH3820> of my heart אֲמָרָ֑י <WH561> My words וְדַ֥עַת <WH1847> knowledge שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י <WH8193> and my lips בָּר֥וּר <WH1305> clearly מִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <WH4448> shall utter
רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> The Spirit אֵ֥ל <WH410> of God עָשָׂ֑תְנִי <WH6213> hath made וְנִשְׁמַ֖ת <WH5397> me and the breath שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> of the Almighty תְּחַיֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2421> hath given me life
אִם־ <WH518> if תּוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> If thou canst הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נִי <WH7725> answer עֶרְכָ֥ה <WH6186> me set [thy words] in order לְ֝פָנַ֗י <WH6440> before הִתְיַצָּֽבָה׃ <WH3320> me stand up

הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold אֲנִ֣י <WH589> to thy כְפִ֣יךָ <WH6310> Behold I [am] according to thy wish לָאֵ֑ל <WH410> in God's מֵ֝חֹ֗מֶר <WH2563> out of the clay קֹרַ֥צְתִּי <WH7169> stead I also am formed גַם־ <WH1571> too אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אֵ֭מָתִי <WH367> Behold my terror לֹ֣א <WH3808> no תְבַעֲתֶ֑ךָּ <WH1204> shall not make thee afraid וְ֝אַכְפִּ֗י <WH405> neither shall my hand עָלֶ֥יךָ <WH5921> and לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִכְבָּֽד׃ <WH3513> be heavy
אַ֭ךְ <WH389> Surely אָמַ֣רְתָּ <WH559> Surely thou hast spoken בְאָזְנָ֑י <WH241> in mine hearing וְק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice מִלִּ֣ין <WH4405> of [thy] words אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> and I have heard

זַ֥ךְ <WH2134> I am clean אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I בְּֽלִ֫י <WH1097> without פָ֥שַׁע <WH6588> without transgression חַ֥ף <WH2643> I [am] innocent אָנֹכִ֑י <WH595> and there וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> is no עָוֹ֣ן <WH5771> neither [is there] iniquity לִֽי׃
הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold תְּ֭נוּאוֹת <WH8569> occasions עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against יִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> Behold he findeth יַחְשְׁבֵ֖נִי <WH2803> against me he counteth לְאוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> me for his enemy לֽוֹ׃
יָשֵׂ֣ם <WH7760> He putteth בַּסַּ֣ד <WH5465> in the stocks רַגְלָ֑י <WH7272> my feet יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> he marketh כָּל־ <WH3605> all אָרְחֹתָֽי׃ <WH734> all my paths

הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> are not צָדַ֣קְתָּ <WH6663> Behold [in] this thou art not just אֶעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <WH6030> I will answer כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִרְבֶּ֥ה <WH7235> is greater אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַ <WH433> thee that God מֵאֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH582> than man

מַ֭דּוּעַ <WH4069> Why אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> against רִיב֑וֹתָ <WH7378> Why dost thou strive כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> of all דְּ֝בָרָ֗יו <WH1697> of any of his matters לֹ֣א־ <WH3808> does not יַעֲנֶֽה׃ <WH6030> against him? for he giveth not account
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed בְאַחַ֥ת <WH259> once יְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> speaketh אֵ֑ל <WH410> For God וּ֝בִשְׁתַּ֗יִם <WH8147> yea twice לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7789> [yet man] perceiveth

בַּחֲל֤וֹם ׀ <WH2472> In a dream חֶזְי֬וֹן <WH2384> in a vision לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> of the night בִּנְפֹ֣ל <WH5307> sleep falleth תַּ֭רְדֵּמָה <WH8639> when deep עַל־ <WH5921> on אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> men בִּ֝תְנוּמ֗וֹת <WH8572> in slumberings עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> in מִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH4904> upon the bed
אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יִ֭גְלֶה <WH1540> Then he openeth אֹ֣זֶן <WH241> the ears אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> of men וּבְמֹ֖סָרָ֣ם <WH4561> their instruction יַחְתֹּֽם׃ <WH2856> and sealeth
לְ֭הָסִיר <WH5493> That he may withdraw אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man מַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH4639> [from his] purpose וְגֵוָ֖ה <WH1466> pride מִגֶּ֣בֶר <WH1397> from man יְכַסֶּֽה׃ <WH3680> and hide

יַחְשֹׂ֣ךְ <WH2820> He keepeth back נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <WH5315> his soul מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from שָׁ֑חַת <WH7845> from the pit וְ֝חַיָּת֗וֹ <WH2416> and his life מֵעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> from perishing בַּשָּֽׁלַח׃ <WH7973> by the sword

וְהוּכַ֣ח <WH3198> He is chastened בְּ֭מַכְאוֹב <WH4341> also with pain עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁכָּב֑וֹ <WH4904> upon his bed [וְרִיב כ] (וְרֹ֖וב <WH7379> adversary ק) עֲצָמָ֣יו <WH6106> of his bones אֵתָֽן׃ <WH386> with strong
וְזִֽהֲמַ֣תּוּ <WH2092> abhorreth חַיָּת֣וֹ <WH2416> So that his life לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> bread וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> and his soul מַאֲכַ֥ל <WH3978> meat תַּאֲוָֽה׃ <WH8378> dainty

יִ֣כֶל <WH3615> is consumed away בְּשָׂר֣וֹ <WH1320> His flesh מֵרֹ֑אִי <WH7210> that it cannot be seen [וּשְׁפִי כ] (וְשֻׁפּ֥וּ <WH8205> high place ק) עַ֝צְמוֹתָ֗יו <WH6106> and his bones לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not רֻאּֽוּ׃ <WH7200> [that] were not seen
וַתִּקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> draweth near לַשַּׁ֣חַת <WH7845> unto the grave נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> Yea his soul וְ֝חַיָּת֗וֹ <WH2416> and his life לַֽמְמִתִֽים׃ <WH4191> to the destroyers

אִם־ <WH518> If יֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> If there עָלָ֨יו ׀ <WH5921> and מַלְאָ֗ךְ <WH4397> be a messenger מֵלִ֗יץ <WH3887> with him an interpreter אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one מִנִּי־ <WH4480> out אָ֑לֶף <WH505> among a thousand לְהַגִּ֖יד <WH5046> to shew לְאָדָ֣ם <WH120> unto man יָשְׁרֽוֹ׃ <WH3476> his uprightness

וַיְחֻנֶּ֗נּוּ <WH2603> Then he is gracious וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> unto him and saith פְּ֭דָעֵהוּ <WH6308> Deliver מֵרֶ֥דֶת <WH3381> him from going down שָׁ֗חַת <WH7845> to the pit מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> I have found כֹֽפֶר׃ <WH3724> a ransom
רֻֽטֲפַ֣שׁ <WH7375> shall be fresher בְּשָׂר֣וֹ <WH1320> His flesh מִנֹּ֑עַר <WH5290> than a child's יָ֝שׁ֗וּב <WH7725> he shall return לִימֵ֥י <WH3117> to the days עֲלוּמָֽיו׃ <WH5934> of his youth

יֶעְתַּ֤ר <WH6279> He shall pray אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱל֨וֹהַּ ׀ <WH433> unto God וַיִּרְצֵ֗הוּ <WH7521> and he will be favourable וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> unto him and he shall see פָּ֭נָיו <WH6440> his face בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> with joy וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> for he will render לֶ֝אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <WH582> unto man צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6666> his righteousness

יָשֹׁ֤ר ׀ <WH7789> He looketh עַל־ <WH5921> upon אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> upon men וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and [if any] say חָ֭טָאתִי <WH2398> I have sinned וְיָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> [that which was] right הֶעֱוֵ֗יתִי <WH5753> and perverted וְלֹא־ <WH3808> is not שָׁ֥וָה <WH7737> and it profited לִֽי׃

פָּדָ֣ה <WH6299> He will deliver [נַפְשִׁי כ] (נַ֭פְשֹׁו <WH5315> any ק) מֵעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> from going בַּשָּׁ֑חַת <WH7845> into the pit [וְחַיָּתִי כ] (וְ֝חַיָּתֹו <WH2416> age ק) בָּא֥וֹר <WH216> the light תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> shall see הֶן־ <WH2005> behold כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner
אֵ֭לֶּה <WH428> these יִפְעַל־ <WH6466> Lo all these [things] worketh אֵ֑ל <WH410> God פַּעֲמַ֖יִם <WH6471> anvil שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <WH7969> three עִם־ <WH5973> with גָּֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> with man

לְהָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> To bring back נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <WH5315> his soul מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from שָׁ֑חַת <WH7845> from the pit לֵ֝א֗וֹר <WH215> to be enlightened בְּא֣וֹר <WH216> with the light הַֽחַיִּים׃ <WH2416> of the living

הַקְשֵׁ֖ב <WH7181> Mark well אִיּ֥וֹב <WH347> O Job שְֽׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> hearken לִ֑י הַ֝חֲרֵ֗שׁ <WH2790> unto me hold thy peace וְאָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> me אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> and I will speak אִם־ <WH518> lo יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> there are
מִלִּ֥ין <WH4405> any thing to say הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נִי <WH7725> answer דַּ֝בֵּ֗ר <WH1696> me speak כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָפַ֥צְתִּי <WH2654> for I desire צַדְּקֶֽךָּ׃ <WH6663> to justify

אִם־ <WH518> If אַ֭יִן <WH369> else אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you שְֽׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> If not hearken לִ֑י הַ֝חֲרֵ֗שׁ <WH2790> unto me hold thy peace וַאֲאַלֶּפְךָ֥ <WH502> and I shall teach חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> thee wisdom ס
